00003 // \author Will Scott
00004 #include "dcsl_miabot_estimator_math.h"
00005 #include <math.h>
00006 
00012 void miabot_propagate_state(Vector3d& state, const Vector2d& u, double dt)
00013 {
00014         double eps = 0.001;
00015         double x_plus, y_plus, theta_plus;
00016         // name incoming variables to make code readable
00017         double x = state(0);
00018         double y = state(1);
00019         double theta = state(2);
00020         double v = u(0);
00021         double omega = u(1);
00022 
00023         if (abs(omega) < eps) // check if moving in straight line
00024         {
00025                 theta_plus = theta; // theta remains constant
00026         x_plus = x + v*dt*cos(theta);
00027                 y_plus = y + v*dt*sin(theta);
00028         }
00029         else
00030         {
00031                 // Otherwise the miabot will go on a circular path with radius v/omega
00032                 theta_plus = theta + omega*dt;
00033                 double radius = v/omega;
00034                 x_plus = x + radius*(sin(theta_plus) - sin(theta));
00035                 y_plus = y + radius*(cos(theta) - cos(theta_plus));
00036         }
00037         state << x_plus, y_plus, theta_plus;
00038 }
00039 
00049 void miabot_propagate_covariance(Matrix3d& p, const Vector3d& x, const Vector2d& u, 
00050         const Matrix3d& q, const Matrix3d& r, double dt)
00051 {
00052         // First calculate f, the jacobian matrix of system dynamics at current state x
00053         Matrix3d f = Matrix3d::Zero();
00054         f(0,2) = -u(0)*sin(x(2));
00055         f(1,2) =  u(0)*cos(x(2));
00056         //f << 0, 0, -u(0)*sin(x(2)), 
00057         //     0, 0,  u(0)*cos(x(2)), 
00058         //     0, 0,  0;
00059         // now step forward one iteration of Euler forward method, over time dt
00060         p = p + dt*(f*p + p*f.transpose() + q);
00061 }
00062 
00069 void miabot_calculate_filter_gain(Matrix3d& k, const Matrix3d& p, const Matrix3d& r)
00070 {
00071         Matrix3d temp = p+r;
00072         k = p*temp.inverse();
00073 }
00074 
00079 void miabot_update_state(Vector3d& x, const Matrix3d& k, const Vector3d& z)
00080 {
00081         x = x + k*(z - x);
00082 }
00083 
00087 void miabot_update_covariance(Matrix3d& p, const Matrix3d& k)
00088 {
00089         Matrix3d ident3d = Matrix3d::Identity();
00090         p = (ident3d - k)*p;
00091 }
